caption.center: Emanuel W. UPSHAW, Appellant, v. Bertha Clark UPSHAW, Appellee.

court.center: Municipal Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM MUNICIPAL COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, DOMESTIC RELATIONS BRANCH, FRANK H. MYERS, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
W. Theophilus Jones, Washington, D.C., for appellant.
No appearance for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before ROVER, Chief Judge, and HOOD and QUINN, Associate Judges.
opinion.opinion_text:
This action was brought by appellant for the annulment of his marriage on the ground of fraud. We have carefully examined the record and find no error affecting substantial rights. The judgment of the trial court is
Affirmed.
